name: Rolling Thru Space
description:
I made this game as a final project for my schooling. I had ten weeks to complete this, and this is the what I made. Its not completely finished, there is still a lot to be done to it, but it has all ten levels, and i'm interested to see if anyone can actually complete all of them.

Infinite lives, no checkpoints, no save points. In time everything will improve.

Controls:

move - arrow keys or w,s,a,d , or joystick

jump - ctrl, left mouse

camera - right mouse + drag, right stick joystick

boost(experimental) - middle click, x joystick

Enjoy!

esc will bring you back to stage select.

Ive added some more stuff in this new update,

1.2 Update-------------------------------

-better camera collision

-added joystick controls

-better controls

-added a boost, experiment with it, middle click

------------------------------------------------------

More updates will be coming, the next big change is the level design.

Good Luck!!

Feel free to leave me a comment
